title: Lombo das Têrças
body: A populated place in the parish of Ponta do Sol, where the chapel of Nossa Senhora do Monte is located, built by the people in 1751 and expanded in 1775, having been subjected to a great desecration in June 1810. There was a chapel dedicated to São Caetano, built in 1780 by António de Carvalhal Esmeraldo e Alencastre.
